tool_description: Forever21 API helps to query for all information about categories, products, etc... as on official websites
name: Forever21
title: Forever21

api_list.name: products/detail (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get detail information of product by id

required_parameters.name: productid
required_parameters.description: Look for values of ProductId object from /products/list API

api_list.name: products/list (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: The page number to display data

required_parameters.name: pagesize
required_parameters.description: The records return in each page

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Look for values in Sizes object, you can pass this param multiple times

optional_parameters.name: maxprice
optional_parameters.description: Limit products return under this amount of money

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: Look for values in Variants object, you can pass this param multiple times

api_list.name: categories/list (Deprecated)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apidojo-forever21-v1.p.rapidapi.com/categories/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apidojo-forever21-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: products/v2/detail
api_list.description: Get detail information of product by id

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: Look for values of ProductId object returned in .../products/v2/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/search

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The name of products to look for

required_parameters.name: rows
required_parameters.description: The number of records to return

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: Look for values in facet_fields object, you can pass this param multiple times

optional_parameters.name: color_groups
optional_parameters.description: Look for values in facet_fields object, you can pass this param multiple times

optional_parameters.name: sizes
optional_parameters.description: Look for values in facet_fields object, you can pass this param multiple times

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: Look for values in facet_fields object, you can pass this param multiple times

api_list.name: categories/v2/list

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://apidojo-forever21-v1.p.rapidapi.com/categories/v2/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apidojo-forever21-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: products/v2/list

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The value of Key field returned in .../categories/v2/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: filterSize
optional_parameters.description: The value of Filter/SizeList/Key JSON object returned right in this endpoint. Pass this parameter multiple times to apply multiple filters at once. Ex : ...&filterSize=XS/S&filterSize=S&...

optional_parameters.name: minPrice
optional_parameters.description: Search for products higher this amount of money, leave empty to ignore this filter.

optional_parameters.name: filterColor
optional_parameters.description: The value of Filter/ColorList/Key JSON object returned right in this endpoint. Pass this parameter multiple times to apply multiple filters at once. Ex : ...&filterColor=BLACK&filterColor=BLUE&...

optional_parameters.name: maxPrice
optional_parameters.description: Search for products lower this amount of money, leave empty to ignore this filter.

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: The page number to display data

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The records return in each page
